WorkItem.Description: i run Rawr version 2.2.24, and whenever i am trying to spec into mark of blood as a Death Knight (new character), the simulator goes into lockup mode and does not respond anymore.
WorkItem.Summary: [TankDK] Speccing into Mark of Blood locks up Rawr

Comments.Message: Is this for TankDK or DPSDK?
as far as i know, only for TankDK. i just tried it wihth DPSDK, and it works

I'm not seeing this issue in the TankDK.  Occassionally, I see a split second of lag while it does the calculation, which it doesn't do when changing other talents, but I don't see it lock up:
Night Elf -> Dk -> TankDK -> Talents -> Climb the tree w/ tanking related talents until MoB.

Please post the character XML you have right before adding MoB and I'll look into it.
I am having this same issue.  TankDK becomes exceedingly slow with a talent point in Mark of Blood, remove the talent point and it works fine.
This is as an orc DK, could be specific to race.

i am adding with this the character XML file for the example you gave, without any changes in gear/options/gemming, just the talent spec up to MoB (but not including).

it might also be that my laptop can't process the data, but that seems weird, since i can run Crysis on lowest detail. i have not yet tried to wait until it unfreezes, but it definitely takes long enough to think Rawr has locked up. i have to use the task manager to shut it down.

Quick update: i tried waiting for the simulator to update this time, and it seemed to take about 3 minutes to get effect. So it is not a true lockup, but it just takes such a long amount of time that you might think it locks up.

adding any points after that makes it take an extra 3 minutes.
